pageProduct.name: Alpha Keri Aloe Soothe Skin Lotion 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
General Information

3 x Hydration after first application

A luxuriously rich and velvety cream, containing super ingredient Organic Aloe Vera. It soothes, replenishes, strengthens and protects – providing clinical benefit for extra dry, sensitive and irritating skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis.

Paraben FREE,  Dermatologist Formula

Warnings

For external use only. If irritation develops, discontinue use.

Common Uses

Deeply moisturise, soothe, repair extra dry, flaky and irritated skin:

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Isopropyl Myristate, Glycine Soja Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Sodium, Polyacrylate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Behenyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Octadecyl Di-T-Butyl-4-Hydroxyhydrocinnamate

Directions

Apply to skin as often as required or directed by a Dermatologist (physician). Use after showering, bathing and cleansing.
